root.name: Broken Sword: The Sleeping Dragon
root.description: This is the first Broken Sword game to grace all three dimensions. The events of the game are incited by two murders, the first is a computer programmer in Paris, killed shortly before he was due to meet Nico to tell her something of great importance; the second is a scientist in the Congo due to meet George to discuss a patent for his invention which would produce infinite energy.
